title: Ripley's Twists: Snakes & Reptiles
description: Brand new for 2015, Ripley’s Twists: Snakes and Reptiles brings the slithery, scaly and strange world of reptiles to readers ages 8 and up. Bursting with amazing photography, compelling illustrations, and all-new content, this easy-to-read 48-page book presents science side-by-side with the scary, shocking, and even the silly—perfect for every Ripley’s fan!
author: Ripley Entertainment Inc.
